message:
Don't be scared off by the author's gospel that fire and forget isn't what you want 99% of the time. If your use-case can handle the occaisional "lost" operation due to server restarts etc, then firing and forgetting is perfectly fine, and much simpler than using queues etc.

I understand this is an old article, but it's linked from a few highly-viewd SO questions, so just want to clear things up.
